inclusion.criterion: PMR according to the American College of Rheumatology (ACR)/European league Against Rheumatism (EULAR) 2012 PMR core (essential) classification criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed PMR being on glucocorticoids for less than 4 weeks
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of any other connective tissue disease, including vasculitis/giant-cell arteritis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: PMR on glucocorticoids for >4 week or >25 mg/day
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of alcohol or drug abuse or current alcohol or drug abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Transplanted organ (except corneal transplant performed more than 3 months prior to screening)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence (as assessed by the investigator) of active infection, presence of hepatitis B surface antigen or hepatitis C antibody in blood, HIV positivity.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Malignancy within 5 years prior to screening, except for non-melanoma skin cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Exposure to DMARD/biological in the last 5 years
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pain syndromes, e.g. fibromyalgia, drug-induced myalgia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 22yo F with systemic mastocytosis and history of flares, currently on steroid taper which is new for her.
